short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that shows the current time and weather on the new tab screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace new tab screen with current time and weather sourced from OpenWeatherMap.org.

Simple replaces your "New Tab" screen with a new one that shows you the current time and the weather, with no tracking, no unnecessary permissions, no BS.

# Update 1.1.0
Added font picker
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Add blinky "new stuff" notification

# Update 1.0.12
CSS updates to make the scaling a bit nicer
Add 1hr caching to weather querying so we don't get booted from the weather API :)

# Update 1.0.11
Previous fix for issue causing defaults to override user settings didn't work in some situations, retrying
Allowed clicking off the settings bar to close it so you don't have to hit the X
long.nl:
Replace new tab screen with current time and weather sourced from OpenWeatherMap.org.

Simple replaces your "New Tab" screen with a new one that shows you the current time and the weather, with no tracking, no unnecessary permissions, no BS.

# Update 1.0.7
Added the weather to the title bar

# Update 1.0.6
Change load order to get the background colors in without waiting for weather/location data

# Update 1.0.5
Add option to set background to a gradient determined by the time of day
Clean up "offline" mode so that weather is cleanly excluded, rather than breaking

# Update 1.0.4
Layout changes
Fix bug causing failure in first weather load
Add current temp in addition to current day min/max temps
